name: Chipmunk Danger World Versus Cars
description:
Pretty easy tile-based puzzle game made with puzzlescript for variety megajam 2020 in under 10 hours.

It's a little rough but maybe fun.

Use arrows to move little chipmunk around.

Press Z to undo a move, and R to restart the level (probably not necessary).

Chipmunk things from the internet that could be true:

Chipmunks can swim but they are slow.

Chipmunks steal each others nuts.

Chipmunks bury rocks to fake out other spying chipmunks who might steal their nuts.

Chipmunks stash so many nuts.
